mapper.select: select a.vsid,a.title,a.stype,a.usercount, ifnull(b.optioncount,0) as optioncount from ( select votesubject.vsid,votesubject.title,votesubject.stype,count( distinct(uid)) as usercount from voteitem right join votesubject on voteitem.vsid=votesubject.vsid group by voteitem.vsid, votesubject.title ) a left join ( select votesubject.vsid, count( * ) as optioncount from votesubject inner join voteoption on voteoption.vsid=votesubject.vsid group by votesubject.vsid )b on a.vsid=b.vsid where a.vsid

select a.voteid,a.voteoption,ifnull(b.votecount,0) as votecount from (select vsid, voteid,voteoption from voteoption where vsid=#{entityId} ) a left join (select vsid,voteid,count(voteid) as votecount from voteitem where vsid=#{entityId} group by voteid )b on a.voteid=b.voteid
